description: People can travel anywhere inside their own county - rather than just be limited to 20km from home.
title: Coronavirus: Irish roadmap out of lockdown accelerated
title_page: Coronavirus: Irish roadmap out of lockdown accelerated - BBC News
maintext: It continues: "It is ridiculous that in a few weeks' time you'll be able to eat a meal in a pub or buy a pair of shoes in Ballina but not in Belfast. We are demanding that Stormont don't let our retail and hospitality sectors fall behind."
